name: react-controllers
description: Utilities for creating React controller components
author: James K Nelson <james@frontarm.com>

scripts.build:commonjs: tsc --pretty --module es2015 --outDir dist/raw && cross-env BUILD_ENV=cjs rollup -c -o dist/commonjs/react-controllers.js
scripts.build:es: tsc --pretty --module es2015 --outDir dist/raw && cross-env BUILD_ENV=es rollup -c -o dist/es/react-controllers.js
scripts.build:umd: tsc --pretty --module es2015 --outDir dist/raw && cross-env BUILD_ENV=umd rollup -c -o dist/umd/react-controllers.js
scripts.build:umd:min: tsc --pretty --module es2015 --outDir dist/raw && cross-env BUILD_ENV=umd-min rollup -c -o dist/umd/react-controllers.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:watch: npm run clean && npm run build:es -- --watch
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
